refnamediv.refpurpose: compute tangents of a sampled curve

varlistentry.listitem: nx2 vector whose i-th line is the unit tangent vector at the i-th sample of the contour.
Binary image containing only one object (0 for background, 1 for object).
standard deviation of the gaussian function used to smooth the contour before computing the curvature. Defaults to 5.
a double number, the time between samples (delta t), and defaults to 1.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Function tangent calculates the tangent direction as a vector at each point of a binary or sampled contour, using FFT and a formula from differential geometry.
